Uses of Class
jhd.DistanceMaps.libJ8.Offsets.OffsetDesc

  • Uses of Offsets.OffsetDesc in jhd.DistanceMaps.libJ8

    Methods in jhd.DistanceMaps.libJ8 that return Offsets.OffsetDesc
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static Offsets.OffsetDesc[] Offsets.get1dOffsets2D​(int width, int height)
    Get the absolute 1D offsets of pixels surrounding a 2D central pixel
    static Offsets.OffsetDesc[] Offsets.get1dOffsets2D​(int width, int height, double pixWidth, double pixHeight)
    Get the absolute 1D offsets and center-to-center distances of pixels surrounding a 2D central pixel, pixel units must be the same
    static Offsets.OffsetDesc[] Offsets.get1dOffsets3D​(int width, int height, int depth)
    Get the absolute 1D offsets of voxels surrounding a 3D central voxel
    static Offsets.OffsetDesc[] Offsets.get1dOffsets3D​(int width, int height, int depth, double pixWidth, double pixHeight, double pixDepth)
    Get the absolute 1D offsets and center-to-center distances of voxels surrounding a central voxel, voxel units must be the same
